rev.desc.rev.desc: remove panel setup.sap
Added am.setup.globals panel for PD CI module
Modified exit of cm.setup.globals panel from cc.setup.globals to am.setup.globals
The Linker background process is unable to update Interactions if Folder Entitlement is enabled
add supporting for pdrm delegation
$G.delegated.pdrm.groups=jscall("ApprovalDelegationGroups.addDelegateGroups", $G.delegated.pdrm.groups, "request")
recompile
QCCR1E99207 - Enhance Service Manager to lazy load all global lists to optimize login performance
check the $G.gobals.setup flag to decide if the global lists are loaded or not, instead of checking the first global list variable ( in alphabetical order, actually, it's not the first now )
Added timeperiod Approval Delegation setup
Background unsuspend on an incident failed
add record access right to problem when user set the allow.access off in incident env setting.
Panel start.0
Added $L.operator=$lo.operator
Turned on the mandant() function.
Added setup of tableAccess field in $G.pm.environment
check.setup.select panel changed to:
not lioption("Incident Management") and not lioption("Service Desk")
Added a call to km.setup.environment RAD app to initialize the $G.km.environment variable when the user logs in. This is used to determine the menu items that are enabled for the user.
Modified to allow "linker" greater access when using DEFAULT profile record.
Changed first exit on check.setup.select panel to decide.build.cat from exit.normal.
apm.setup.globals, send.core.lists: Removed Panel, changed following two panels to exit to setup.cm3.env instead of send.core.lists:
gen.core.lists.go
list.failed.msg.1
apm.setup.globals, send.global.env: removed panel, it only had one line:
variable.send("$G.am.global.environment")
apm.setup.globals, send.profile: Removed following line:
variable.send("$G.pm.environment")
Will now build lists if licensed for either Service or Incident management, instead of requiring Incident management.
added the following panels to create the stathistory records:
init.stathistory
named.or.floating
check.stathistory.named
check.stathistory.floating
add.named.stathistory
update.named.stathistory
add.floating.stathistory
update.floating.stathistory
update.stathistory.record
add.stathistory.record
updated the send.profile panel to add logic for the named user license schema
Removed change I made for Change 25695. It was unnecessary because this global was being set in apm.get.authcats.
added the following to the send.profile panel:
$G.auth.categories=denull(categories in $G.pm.environment)
This global can now be used to limit users access to certain categories in Incident Management
Changed the occurrence of lioption("Problem Management") to lioption("Incident Management") in the check.setup.select panel.
Added lioption check.
Modified to select profile stored in the profile.incident field in the operator record.
Continue on with a message if apm.global.initer fails.
Recompile: text fg trace of scheduler dies on
return to this app; does a recompile help?
(No RAD changes made.)
Added call to sap.setup.globals
moved out root currency setup to cm.setup.globals
added call to cm.setup.globals

will now initialize the $G.root.currency code if it isn't already initialized at this point. In theory, this variable gets set up in login, but its possible to get here without logging in e.g. schedulers, etc.
Converted to use scmsg().
Added call to cc.setup.globals and panels to copy in SM related fields from the SM global variables.
Evaluate the initialization expressions after selecting the pmenv record.
Changed globallist processing to get list from "Startup Lists" listrepository record or from globallist file.
Don't display the messages if in background mode.
Broke the decision panel into 4 separate panels to ensure that all parts of the process get a chance to run.
Added check before variable.send to resolve scheduler conflicts.
Added a background flag.
Changed the message if number of environment records ~=1.
send $G.sync.events and $G.sch.events to the server.
removed previous change.
When setting up $G.pm.environment if no profile is found and allow.access (use default profile) is false then build a blank pmenv record with name="linker" if operator()="linker".
Added panel to setup cm3 environment variables.

descript.descript: remove panel setup.sap
Added am.setup.globals panel for PD CI module
Modified exit of cm.setup.globals panel from cc.setup.globals to am.setup.globals
The Linker background process is unable to update Interactions if Folder Entitlement is enabled
add supporting for pdrm delegation
$G.delegated.pdrm.groups=jscall("ApprovalDelegationGroups.addDelegateGroups", $G.delegated.pdrm.groups, "request")
recompile
Enhance Service Manager to lazy load all global lists to optimize login performance
Added timeperiod Approval Delegation setup
Background unsuspend on an incident failed
add record access right to problem when user set the allow.access off in incident env setting.
Panel start.0
Added $L.operator=$lo.operator
Turned on the mandant() function.
Added setup of tableAccess field in $G.pm.environment
check.setup.select panel changed to:
not lioption("Incident Management") and not lioption("Service Desk")
Added a call to km.setup.environment RAD app to initialize the $G.km.environment variable when the user logs in. This is used to determine the menu items that are enabled for the user.
Modified to allow "linker" greater access when using DEFAULT profile record.
Changed first exit on check.setup.select panel to decide.build.cat from exit.normal.
apm.setup.globals, send.core.lists: Removed Panel, changed following two panels to exit to setup.cm3.env instead of send.core.lists:
gen.core.lists.go
list.failed.msg.1
apm.setup.globals, send.global.env: removed panel, it only had one line:
variable.send("$G.am.global.environment")
apm.setup.globals, send.profile: Removed following line:
variable.send("$G.pm.environment")
Will now build lists if licensed for either Service or Incident management, instead of requiring Incident management.
added the following panels to create the stathistory records:
init.stathistory
named.or.floating
check.stathistory.named
check.stathistory.floating
add.named.stathistory
update.named.stathistory
add.floating.stathistory
update.floating.stathistory
update.stathistory.record
add.stathistory.record
updated the send.profile panel to add logic for the named user license schema
Removed change I made for Change 25695. It was unnecessary because this global was being set in apm.get.authcats.
added the following to the send.profile panel:
$G.auth.categories=denull(categories in $G.pm.environment)
This global can now be used to limit users access to certain categories in Incident Management
Changed the occurrence of lioption("Problem Management") to lioption("Incident Management") in the check.setup.select panel.
Added lioption check.
Modified to select profile stored in the profile.incident field in the operator record.
Continue on with a message if apm.global.initer fails.
Recompile: text fg trace of scheduler dies on
return to this app; does a recompile help?
(No RAD changes made.)
Added call to sap.setup.globals
moved out root currency setup to cm.setup.globals
added call to cm.setup.globals

will now initialize the $G.root.currency code if it isn't already initialized at this point. In theory, this variable gets set up in login, but its possible to get here without logging in e.g. schedulers, etc.
Converted to use scmsg().
Added call to cc.setup.globals and panels to copy in SM related fields from the SM global variables.
Evaluate the initialization expressions after selecting the pmenv record.
Changed globallist processing to get list from "Startup Lists" listrepository record or from globallist file.
Don't display the messages if in background mode.
Broke the decision panel into 4 separate panels to ensure that all parts of the process get a chance to run.
Added check before variable.send to resolve scheduler conflicts.
Added a background flag.
Changed the message if number of environment records ~=1.
send $G.sync.events and $G.sch.events to the server.
removed previous change.
When setting up $G.pm.environment if no profile is found and allow.access (use default profile) is false then build a blank pmenv record with name="linker" if operator()="linker".
Added panel to setup cm3 environment variables.
